channel.title: Compiler for a Windows 7 64 bit?
channel.description:
Mmk, so the compiler on my client/server don't work. When i open it it says [code=text]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
But.. in my Java its.. Program Files (x86) > Java > jre6.. i don't have that jdk1.6.0_26. :|..
So.. how do i get the compiler to work on my computer? Or what do i download to get that jdk1.6.0_26 file and what not..

item.title: Compiler for a Windows 7 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

JDK V7 Download

@echo off
Title Compiler
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler for a Windows 7 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Decysp, post:1, topic:412178”]Mmk, so the compiler on my client/server don’t work. When i open it it says

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

But… in my Java its… Program Files (x86) > Java > jre6… i don’t have that jdk1.6.0_26. :|…

So… how do i get the compiler to work on my computer? Or what do i download to get that jdk1.6.0_26 file and what not…[/quote]

You need to download the JDK. Before you ask how/where to do that, google it.

Read full topic
